meanings.definition: To command someone not to do something.
meanings.sent1: Mom forbids me from eating cookies before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The sign forbids parking in this area.
meanings.sent3: I tried to forbid the cat from chasing the laser pointer, but it just wouldn't listen.
meanings.sent4: The strict teacher forbids any talking during the exam.
meanings.sent5: The king forbids anyone from entering the forbidden forest.

meanings.definition: To prohibit or prevent something from happening.
meanings.sent1: The doctor forbids me from eating too much sugar.
meanings.sent2: The new law forbids smoking in public places.
meanings.sent3: I had to forbid myself from buying more shoes because I already have too many.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds forbid any outdoor activities today.
meanings.sent5: The security guard forbids anyone without a pass from entering the building.
